column2: an A.M. Eatery////The inside is very clean and crisp. The menu is full of options! Very reasonable prices. Fast service! Which makes up for the wait. I order the pomegranate margarita
column3: which was honestly one of the best margaritas I've had. I'd recommend this over the mimosas. I order a Blueberry Danish pancake and the Snooze Spud Deluxe
column4: which is hash browns topped with cheese scallions and two extra toppings of your choice
column5: I chose bacon and avocados. The pancake was very good
column7: the blueberry and the lemon cream cheese filling blended very well. The spud deluxe was delicious! Filling
column8: flavorful but not overwhelming. I tasted my date's French toast and that was just as good!
